definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: "Tergiversate" is Word of The Year 2011 according to Dictionary. com.
sentences.chinese: “搖擺不定”當選爲“字典網”的2011年度熱詞。

sentences.english: Hot words on the Internet don't stay hot for long.
sentences.chinese: 網絡熱詞的生命力往往不會持久。
